markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs=""
>
[Invigorating Breath](/Feats.aspx?ID=4110) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 83

**Archetype** [Scions of Domora](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=202)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Scion of Domora Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4106)

**Requirements**
You are adjacent to your spirit guide or it is sharing your space.

</column>

---

Your spirit guide exhales its sweet-smelling breath on you, granting you the strength to push through your pain. You gain 20 temporary Hit Points for 10 minutes. At 15th level, you instead gain 30 temporary Hit Points for 10 minutes.
name: Invigorating Breath
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars pg. 83
requirement: You are adjacent to your spirit guide or it is sharing your space.
requirement_markdown: You are adjacent to your spirit guide or it is sharing your space.
